application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Ash Tree (applicants ref. T8) - Cut back 2-3 metres from the building. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.Mixed Species Trees (applicants ref. G1) - Prune to give 2 metre clearance. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.Group of Ash Trees (applicants ref G2) - Remove 3 x overhanging limbs. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Yew Tree (applicants ref. T1) - Lift to 4m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Yew Tree (applicants ref. T2) - Lift to 4 metres all round and cut back from church building by 2-3 metres. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Yew Tree (applicants ref. T9) - Prune 2-3 metres away from the Church roof. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cedar Tree (applicants ref. T4) - Prune 2-3 metres away from the Church roof and chimney, remove major deadwood. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Corsican Pine Tree (applicants ref. T3) - Prune 2-3 metres away from the Church roof. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Dead Yew Tree (applicants ref. T5) - Remove to ground level. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Ash Tree (applicants ref. T6) - Remove major deadwood and lift to 6m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Sycamore tree (applicants ref. T7) - Remove major deadwood. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
site_name: Holy Trinity Church77 Church LaneLondonN2 0TH
